product_name: Sugoi Titan Ice Long-Sleeve Shirt - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Stay cool as your body heats up in the men's Sugoi Titan Ice Long-Sleeve Shirt. It uses an advanced, moisture-wicking fabric to provide a cooling effect during long runs in hot weather. Moisture-wicking, quick-drying breathable fabric features a specialized technology that reduces the surface temperature of the fabric to create a cooling effect. The men's Sugoi Titan Ice Long-Sleeve Shirt features reflective accents. Rear pocket stores essentials; specially placed seams reduce abrasion. Closeout.
short_description: Stay cool as your body heats up in the men's Sugoi Titan Ice Long-Sleeve Shirt. It uses an advanced, moisture-wicking fabric to provide a cooling effect during long runs in hot weather.
